alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Northern Calcasieu; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:12PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Beauregard, Calcasieu Parishes in southwestern Louisiana and south central Newton Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 512 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Singer to near De Quincy to 6 miles west of Grand Lake. Movement was west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Charles, Sulphur, Westlake, Vinton, Merryville, Singer, Lake Charles Regional Airport, Deweyville, Starks, Fields, Bon Weir, De Quincy, Moss Bluff, Carlyss, Lunita, Bivens, Buhler, Hartburg, Toomey and Old Salem. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 29. Interstate 210 between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
